scripts.e2e:run:cypress:dashboard: dotenv -- cross-var npx cypress run --record --key %CYPRESS_RECORD_KEY% --tag Regression
scripts.e2e:run:cypress:dashboard:ci: dotenv -- cross-var npx cypress run --record --tag Regression
scripts.e2e:run:cypress:dashboard:smoke: dotenv -- cross-var npx cypress run --record --key %CYPRESS_RECORD_KEY% --env grepTags=@smoke --browser chrome --tag smoke
